CustomField.description: Compare Numeric value of System Where to Nurse Recommendation Where, when either or both are recommending virtual/tele care. Used for reporting.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( VCC_Nurse_Where_Value__c =3, VCC_System_Where_Value__c <> 3), 'VCV Up-Triage', IF( AND( VCC_System_Where_Value__c =3, VCC_Nurse_Where_Value__c <> 3), 'VCV Down-Triage', 'No Change'))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Compare Numeric value of System Where to Nurse Recommendation Where, when either or both are recommending virtual/tele care.
CustomField.label: VCV Triage Difference
